channel.title: [614]Rs-Virtue. 100% online, you wont be dissapointed. [WEBCLIENT]
channel.description:
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3csmxFCSYW4&feature=autoplay&list=FLmsxW8qFN6DSuMPXCeUiTBQ&playnext=2[/youtube]
[font=arial black][size=36pt]Rs-Virtue[/size][/font]] A PKing and Skilling sever with a 100% GUARENTEED Uptime
[b]Looking for a server with perfect switches? Are you looking for a server with a 24/7 active wilderness? Then Rs Virtue is the place for you.
Rs Virtue has been around for well over a year, and continues to grow on a daily basis. The server has been active ever since it started, both in game and forums.
Rs Virtue is managed professionally and efficiently. Our honest, friendly staff members can be reached 24/7, and are always willing to provide you the support and help needed, both in game and on the forums.
The Rs Virtue Staff Team is a group of highly trained, well respected players that are an integral part of the Rs Virtue community. Each staff member is hand-picked by the Owner, and is subject to rigorous training before achieving any staff position. The requirements for becoming a staff member are rigorous, but we do welcome applications from players seeking to join the staff team.
Rs Virtue Features
- 24/7 Active Pking & Skilling community.
- Skilling Benefits including a Completionist Cape for the most dedicated Skillers.
- Excellent Staff
- Weekly Updates
- Multiple Daily Server Events including Free For Alls, Hide and Seeks, and More!
- Active Forums (Counting more than 8.000 accounts)
- Custom items
- Stable economy (no economy reset to date)
- Starter pack & ::train command (Easy leveling)
- Godwars
- Barrows
- Full Fight Caves featuring Jad
- Special benefits for donators (Such as Donator’s island)
- Working Spirit Shields and Chaotics
We hope to see you soon![/b] [i] [b] Forums ; www.rs-virtue.net
webclient ; www.rs-virtue.net/webclient/webclient.html[/b][/i]

item.title: [614]Rs-Virtue. 100% online, you wont be dissapointed. [WEBCLIENT]
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“TheHolyGrail, post:3, topic:452781”][quote author=Soulcist link=topic=555649.msg4068047#msg4068047 date=1344090032]
Well, I’m not going to watch the video, I’d prefer pictures. Those forums looks nice though, like em’ a lot.
[/quote]Forums are always a major factor for you huh? ;D[/quote]
Yes, I find them as a first-impression, if I don’t like the forums, I don’t like the entire thing.

OT: So, I forced myself to watch the video and it was BASICALLY dueling, it doesn’t seem so appealing but at least the forums are nice haha.

Read full topic
